originalText.text:
One of the most appalling spa experiences I have ever experienced. I am furious at the way I was treated by the staff at Vicki Morav.
This spa is a scam disguised as a luxury.

text.text:
One of the most appalling spa experiences I have ever experienced. I am furious at the way I was treated by the staff at Vicki Morav.
This spa is a scam disguised as a luxury.

originalText.text: 10/10. Hands down the absolute best place for a facial in NYC! I have been getting bimonthly / monthly facials for the past 5 years at another top NYC spa, and after having been recommended to Vicki Morav multiple times by a highly regarded professional and person friend in the beauty industry, I finally decided to give it a try and I cannot recommend enough! The facility, products, and services are all elite and well worth the price tag. I now see Natasha and after two facials, I can say my skin looks better now, than it ever has before (and I‚Äôve tried all types of fancy facials, microcurrents, lasers, injections, expensive tools and products, etc). I highly highly recommend the microneedling! I have very sensitive and reactive skin and I‚Äôm on day 2 and my skin has improved drastically!

text.text: 10/10. Hands down the absolute best place for a facial in NYC! The facility, products, and services are all elite and well worth the price tag. I now see Natasha and after two facials, I can say my skin looks better now, than it ever has before (and I‚Äôve tried all types of fancy facials, microcurrents, lasers, injections, expensive tools and products, etc). originalText.text: Incredible customer service, fast shipping and prompt, friendly responses with product inquiries. I live in the Midwest, so I have never been able to visit the spa in person, but I have always felt like a valued customer. The one & only time I had an issue with a product (faulty packaging, no fault of theirs.) it was taken care of immediately. Could not ask for better customer service!

text.text: Incredible customer service, fast shipping and prompt, friendly responses with product inquiries. I live in the Midwest, so I have never been able to visit the spa in person, but I have always felt like a valued customer. The one & only time I had an issue with a product (faulty packaging, no fault of theirs.) it was taken care of immediately. Could not ask for better customer service!

originalText.text:
I have been ordering my BR products from Resque Spa for years but this time I decided to try Vicki Morav.
First and Last time.
Yes, my order arrived for 3 days which is the only good thing.
I opened my bottle of Lotion p50V a couple of weeks after I received it because I had left from my previous one.
And here start my disappointment...
Very watery consistency, not the same smell and it doesn't turn my face red as usual p50V does on my skin.
I contacted the customer service about the issue but they don't seem to care. There is nothing they can do. I should have contact them earlier - their answer.
Thank you Vicki Morav!

originalText.text: I usually order somewhere else‚Ä¶this time I tried Vicki Morav! I ordered 8.4oz p50v 1970 and 8.4oz Lait VIP O2. When I received my order it was 1.7oz p50 1970 and samples! I was livid and sent an email‚Ä¶ and not even an hour later I got a response! Mistakes happen and someone got my order and I got theirs! Hopefully, they do the right thing because their order was way different than mine! They apologized and let me keep the order I received, and promptly sent my actual order out to me! To me everything was all good‚Ä¶and they redeemed themselves! However, I received my order today‚Ä¶and they more than made up for it with samples, and my correct order‚Ä¶and it came so quickly! I will never buy from anywhere else this place is awesome! This is how you admit the mistake and gain loyal customers! I would give ten stars if I could! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏èü´∂üèº
